raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

IL-2 is captured by IL-2Rα through a large hydrophobic binding surface surrounded by a polar periphery that results in a relatively weak interaction (Kd 10-8 M) with rapid on-off binding kinetics.
The pseudo-high affinity of the IL-2/α/β trimeric complex (i.e. Kd ˜300 pM) clearly indicates that the trimeric complex is more stable than either IL-2 bound to the α chain alone (Kd=10 nM) or to the β chain alone (Kd=450 nM) as shown by Ciardelli's data.
The formation of the high-affinity quaternary IL-2-IL-2R complex leads to signal transduction through the tyrosine kinases Jak1 and Jak3, which are associated with IL-2Rβ and γc, respectively, and has a Kd of 10-11 M which is 10 pM).
